section.title: tar: removing leading '/' from member names
section.screen: neo@MacBook-Pro-Neo ~ > kubectl cp netkiller/job-executor-77fc6b4db-5dzxz:/logs/info.2022-07-29.log Downloads/info.2022-07-29.log -c job-executor tar: removing leading '/' from member names
section.para: 解决方案，路径 /logs/info.2022-07-29.log 改为 logs/info.2022-07-29.log

section.title: failed to create fsnotify watcher: too many open files⏎
